src:
「雨イジング・スパイダーマン」…雨の日、ビルからビルへ飛び移る泥棒

02 Nov 2019, 20:00

　新宿のビルに侵入して現金を盗んだとして、警視庁新宿署は２日、住所・職業不詳の男（２６）を建造物侵入と窃盗の容疑で逮捕したと発表した。雨の日に建物を飛び移って盗みを繰り返していたとみられ、同署は「アメ（雨）イジング　スパイダーマン」と呼んで捜査していた。
　新宿署幹部によると、男は４月１４日深夜～１５日未明、新宿区の５階建て雑居ビルに侵入し、屋上のプレハブから６万６０００円を盗んだ疑い。逮捕は１日。調べに対し、黙秘している。
　雑居ビルの屋上と隣接するビルの６階の窓には、男が飛び移ったとみられる形跡が見つかったという。周辺では４～１０月、ビルの高層階を狙った窃盗事件が約２０件発生しており、同署が関連を調べている。
text:
Is it Kafka, Pelevin or Sorokin?
02 Nov 2019, 20:12 by alex_ivanov
In Sevastopol, people in robes and camouflage pants detained journalists who were shooting a dump in Sevastopol near the divine temple of Alexander Peresvet and Andrei Oslyaby of Radonezh, military men and people in robes and camouflage ... zona.media
In Sevastopol, near the divine church of Alexander Peresvet and Andrey Oslyaby of Radonezh, the military and people in cassocks and camouflage pants detained journalists Viktor Yaduha and Nadezhda Isaeva, who were photographing a landfill of building materials in the military unit, Novaya Gazeta reports. “We did not enter the territory of the unit. We stood at the temple, from which the landfill is clearly visible. But as soon as Nadezhda took out a camera, two people in cassocks ran out of the temple, under which camouflage was visible. They said that taking pictures in this place is prohibited. They called the military authorities. As a result, eight armed men surrounded us now. They say they are forced to detain us. We are waiting for the arrival of either the police or the FSB, ”Yadukh told the newspaper.
